tweets.text: @FloodSkinner @EnvAgency Congrats Chris! :)

If the the @EnvAgency CEO @JamesBevanEA is not aware that sewage is discharged into chalk streams what chance have we got. The @RiverChess has had 79 sewage discharges over a 16 month period between 24 Sept 2019 and 25th Jan 2021.
I'm very happy to let you all know that from April I will be going the @EnvAgency as a Senior Hydrologist in the Flood Hydrology Improvement team! #TeamEA https://t.co/GvqMKB0Vt2

tweets.text:
🚯Years and years and years of neglect, volunteers clearing up thousands of rubbish bags, and now a mainstream media report on the damage done to a local SSSI. 

Thankyou @MartinStewITV for reporting, and @welshharpies for standing up for nature! 💪🏻🦢💪🏿

https://t.co/aLQFayua81
Front Vehicle has broken down in the   River Wyre,Garstang during Lockdown, is it covered by RAC/AA/Green Flag etc ? @BBCLancashire @leponline @LiveLancs #dailyexercise https://t.co/EOUPvabLvL

tweets.text:
Some good news today with ground investigation work  starting on Padiham’s £9 million #flood scheme this week!

Once completed, the scheme will better protect over 150 homes, businesses and key infrastructure

👉https://t.co/hyszj7Ki5r https://t.co/A6R8l8BX5Z

@RiverChess @thameswater have turned the River Chess from a rare chalkstream into a cheap extension of their sewerage network. What is the @EnvAgency doing to prevent this destruction of a precious natural resource?

tweets.text:
Still more than a month to get involved with the push to get more people fishing!

Grants of £500 available to encourage new or returning anglers 

More details and how to apply to the #GetFishingFund from @envagency and @anglingtrust: https://t.co/jy8pwqGam0 https://t.co/sQO7nsaZJD

urls.title: £100k Get Fishing Fund to benefit new anglers - Angling Trust
urls.description: New Get Fishing Fund will fund more opportunities for new anglers Environment Agency reports over a million rod licences have been sold this year Higher rod licence sales prompts increased investment in the sport The Environment Agency and Angling Trust have today (1st December 2020) announced a new £100k ‘Get Fishing Fund’ to encourage more […]

tweets.text: @realJohnKempf @agricontract @Farmer_Tom_UK @EnvAgency *massive

This is fantastic news from @EnvAgencyNW and @AndynBrown16. Getting the Padiham flood defences built asap is a shared priority for all of us and this shows progress is being made 🚧👷 https://t.co/AbqVY9dyJs

@janeweston6 @agricontract @Farmer_Tom_UK @EnvAgency ...huge effort into building healthy soils / regenerative agriculture / low till for which all farmers who do this need to be commended. But using flawed science doesn't help - the opposite in fact.Which is a bit heart breaking as farmers need all support they can get right now😕

@hortijames @agricontract @EnvAgency @HerefordshireWT say it's an SSSI.

https://t.co/3AKi3vZHJM

@driverfarms1 @realJohnKempf @agricontract @suesustainable @Farmer_Tom_UK @EnvAgency It’s in two fronts. A drainage system that’s not maintained (see photo) and a motorway run off that’s - not maintained....

@audlemagronpaul @realJohnKempf @agricontract @suesustainable @Farmer_Tom_UK @EnvAgency But he’s not just talking about motorway flooding in the video. I get that though and it’s a fair point something needs to be done about water from other causes

Deputy Leader @cllrcolinkemp presents a report on @ThamesScheme - part of the council's £270m commitment to reduce flood risk in the county

Cabinet has agreed to take it forward as a Development Consent Order application in partnership with @EnvAgency 

https://t.co/3SGdGz8Suw https://t.co/60Ds9NUsQE
Bewdley bridge is now fully open https://t.co/9klunHHDFT

All park friend groups in Liverpool with lakes, illegal fishing is taking place using nets across the parks & Lpool canal. Please check your lakes daily, inform anglers & report to @EnvAgency and remove if found. @teire @FOPP2018 @RobertaPeak2 @ILoveSeftonPark @of_fonp https://t.co/pHwAqwuZ4U

@realJohnKempf @agricontract @suesustainable @driverfarms1 @Farmer_Tom_UK @EnvAgency Read Olly’s reply. ALL his flooding is down to other agencies. 
It’s infrastructure not being managed that is doing HIS flooding. If only people would read....

Works are progressing well on Phase 2 of the #Carlisle #Flood Risk Management Scheme

This week shuttering has been stripped ready for brick work. 

For more information https://t.co/gxCTOEbsAK https://t.co/gBiapeELKW
@ChamberlainJay_ @worcscc @WyreForestDC @EnvAgencyMids No, still closed currently - further barriers to be removed & cleanup operation - short diversion via Westbourne Street
@WorcsTravel @worcscc @WyreForestDC @EnvAgencyMids What about the B4190/B4095 junction just down from the bridge?

It’s frosty but our enforcement officers are still out & about like in #Staffs making sure anglers are licensed.

Fishing is allowed in #coronavirus lockdown if you stay local, limit this to once a day, no overnight #fishing & keep social distancing.

https://t.co/f5iTBUKpsS https://t.co/o85K5wSwVu

tweets.text: @agricontract @driverfarms1 @realJohnKempf @Farmer_Tom_UK @EnvAgency That is an ignorant and mindless comment if I might say so

@agricontract @suesustainable @driverfarms1 @Farmer_Tom_UK @EnvAgency Dwayne Beck describes in the podcast interview how they transitioned challenged soils to soils that have the capacity to absorb nine inches of rainfall per hour. A narrow motorway will not be capable of exceeding fields absorption capacity when at that level.
@agricontract @suesustainable @realJohnKempf @Farmer_Tom_UK @EnvAgency It’s not pedantic it completely in validates your argument !

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Presumably he is referring to the EA's declared purpose, which includes the phrase  “to protect or enhance the environment, taken as a whole”. 'Taken as a whole' - how many weasels and get-out clauses does that encompass?

@bevo164 I don't think I've seen quite so much ocre water in one place. Probably not much to worry about, but I'll tag @EnvAgencyYNE @WildSheffield @ParksSheffield and @DonCatchmentRT to see if they agree.
@driverfarms1 @suesustainable @realJohnKempf @Farmer_Tom_UK @EnvAgency Suspended then #pedantic

The @guardian said thousands at risk from "ruined" flood defences in #stormchristoph. No. 

We protected 38,000 properties. NONE flooded as a result of us: https://t.co/8InCuSK6e3

But we go again. More rain ⬇️ . Check/register for FREE alerts: https://t.co/RdGOOBf9Of
#floodaware https://t.co/cm2tXhhgBU
